articles.image_title: BIRMINGHAM, ENGLAND - OCTOBER 04: Prime Minister Liz Truss (centre) and Chancellor of the Exchequer Kwasi Kwarteng (second right) during a visit to a construction site for a medical innovation campus in Birmingham, on day three of the Conservative Party annual conference at the International Convention Centre in Birmingham on October 04, 2022 in Birmingham, England. This year the Conservative Party Conference will be looking at "Getting Britain Moving" with more jobs and higher salaries.
